meaningMnemonic: You've seen 逃げる and 逃す. This one is 逃れる. This one simply means <vocabulary>to escape</vocabulary>. So that's not too bad. The difference between this one and the other escapes is that it has to do more with luck.
readingMnemonic: This is the same reading you learned for 逃す, so you should be able to read this word as well.
